DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to demonstrate the safety and effectiveness of the Adacolumn Apheresis System to treat the signs and symptoms of ulcerative colitis.
DOC.brief_title: Study for the Treatment of Ulcerative Colitis With Adacolumn (Companion to US Study 512-04-205)
DOC.detailed_description: Study Type: Interventional Study Design: Treatment, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo Control, Parallel Assignment, Safety/Efficacy Study.
